title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Land & Agriculture	

Issued on:
September 22, 2019
On Sunday, September 22, 2019, the President signed into law:H.R. 831, the “Reviving America’s Scenic Byways Act of 2019,” which requires the Secretary of Transportation to issue a request for nominations for the National Scenic Byways Program and, within one year of issuing the request, make publicly available a list identifying the roads to be designated under the program.
